Keywords: Animal , Assassin , Weapon X , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: James Howlett
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: X-FORCE THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Wolverine is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] If 3+ friendly characters with the X-Force keyword are on the map, friendly characters modify attack +1 when targeting opposing characters that can use [Improved Targeting: Hindering]. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can�t choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
02
TEAM UP: COLOSSUS: Listed friendly character can use Telekinesis, but only to place an adjacent Wolverine. When the listed character uses it, after resolutions Wolverine may use Charge at no cost. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
03
TEAM UP: MARVEL GIRL, CYCLOPS: If Wolverine and all listed friendly characters are on the map, when they attack they modify damage +1 for each [3] in their (final) attack roll. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
04
TEAM UP: X-MEN THEMED TEAM: When establishing themed teams, friendly characters with the X-Men keyword gain the Jean Grey School of Higher Learning keyword. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
05
TEAM UP: CYCLOPS, STORM, NIGHTCRAWLER, COLOSSUS, THUNDERBIRD, BANSHEE: If 2+ listed friendly characters are on the map, when Wolverine or a listed friendly character is KO'd, after resolutions each other listed character heals 1 click. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
06
TEAM UP: BISHOP, STORM, GAMBIT, ROGUE, SAGE: If 2+ listed friendly characters are on the map, at the beginning of the turn if Wolverine or a listed friendly character has 2 action tokens, that character may make a close attack at no cost. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
Special Powers
THE MUTANT C.I.A.: Stealth. Improved Movement: Hindering. Improved Targeting: Hindering.
WEAPON X REJECT: Charge, Flurry.

June 1, 2021
RichardFisk
In addition, the possibility of using team up cards can represent important moments in the comic: the launch of colossus, the inclusion of Xmen from regenesis, cyclops and jean, X-Force this give you more flexibility to the figure. In my opinion this Is one the most versatile wolverine figures in game.
June 1, 2021
RichardFisk
I would like to begin my criticism of this figure in the following way: 1. This is a wonderful piece because the scale of the sculpture is incredible, 2. The resemblance to the house of x comic is very close. 3. In terms of keywords, they are the closest to the perfect keywords, I would have liked them to add Avengers. 4. To be a part of the x-force team and the mutant CIA it's pretty balanced with the strategy of hiding and attacking twice doing penetrating 5 damage.
February 26, 2021
DarkTortoise23
The new rules turn this guy into an absolute monster top click. Movement+Two attacks a turn, each at +11(+13 if you team him up with the common forge from this set), for a total of 6 penetrating damage top click, 8 if you can get an empower piece to back him up. Once you get past the one or two invincible clicks on a lot of characters, this wolverine is an easy way to shred the rest of their dial for an easy kill.
February 19, 2021
doctorone
An object that claws him from the start and bob defeats any superman, empower also counts.

January 14, 2021
hoojeebo
@Thunderclese I just asked my friends the same thing the other day, and none of us knew what team that was either. The thing is, I checked the X-Treme X-Men roster on Wikipedia, and then flipped through some of my old issues, and I guess Logan did hang around the XX for issues #20-30, so I guess that's what this is meant to portray. In fact, this exact team is shown on page 1 of issue 20. It's still a stretch though, since I don't really think of Wolverine when I think of the X-Treme team.
January 11, 2021
Thunderclese
We got a couple great Wolvies in this set, that’s for sure. Someone help me out. What era or team is the 06 Team Up card supposed to represent? It seems like Xtreme X-Men but Wolverine wasn’t on that team if I recall.
January 9, 2021
Cyke82
I love this Wolverine. There’s so much to like here. First of all, a Wolverine with X-Force keyword and the Mutant CIA trait is a great thematic combo. Perfect for a thematic X-Force line up. The Stealth gives some extra protection while he moves up for the Charge and either Flurry or Exploit combo. CR makes him tough to hit up close, though you’ll have to be careful with positioning to keep him protected from ranged snipers. I really wish that final 18 with Regen was a STOP click but beggars can’t be choosers. I can’t wait to use the team up card for Colossus to Fastball Special this guy!
